topic.title: Planning Multiple Homicides? Kill Brazilians!
topic.body:
If you want to purge, come to Brazil and kill as many Brazilians as you wish. If you can't travel that far, find the nearest community of Brazilian expats on your country and kill them all.

Thank you.

topic.title: See a Brazilian? KILL A BRAZILIAN!
topic.body:
Don't let the infestation take hold.
Kill them all while their numbers are small, else you find your country as Brazil 2.0.

topic.title: The Death of Every Brazilian is of Uttermost Importance
topic.body: Take no prisoners, kill them all.

topic.title: The Voice of The People is The Voice of God
topic.body:
You only have to search 4chan archives for "nuke brazil" to confirm that people all over the world chant in unison:

NUKE BRAZIL!
NUKE BRAZIL!
NUKE BRAZIL!
NUKE BRAZIL!

God will deliver, his right hand shall fall hard, Brazil must be destroyed.

topic.title: Every Dollar Saved is One More Dollar to Make Guns and Nukes to Decimate Brazil
topic.body:
This is a goal worthy of striving for, if there ever was one: the death of each Brazilian.

Nothing shall get in our the way. The shall suffer and die.

I thank every Nobel prize winner who gaves us the tech to make this possible, and all the others who did not get a prize, but helped anyway. Thanks to you we will be able to kill all of them. Thank you.

topic.title: Notepad++ v9.9.9 : Nuke Brazil Edition
topic.body: Because if you think China is bad, Brazil will make you sick on your soul.

topic.title: If you aren't nuking Brazil, you aren't paying attention.
topic.body: To kill a Brazilian is the most humanistic action you can take today.

1573186132_1GDtf6kkYiCtruw42QmAeaHG1HsrW.body: Pretty words, but if you want to show some serious commitment to that end: NUKE BRAZIL.
